content.rendered:
Meet the Team

Power Plant Services presents an experienced, knowledgeable and insightful team of industrial manufacturing professionals dedicated to serving you—our valued customer


PPS is a company built on family values, but also on the understanding that to be the best we must also assemble the best in the industry. Our team has both OEM and aftermarket experience, which is channeled into a desire to make Power Plant Services the leading industrial manufacturing service provider for all the industries and sectors we serve.

Our Executive Leadership Team has helped PPS secure industry leadership, develop new markets and most importantly, they are the engine that powers our company and its achievements:


Manny Gandhi

Contact Power Plant Services today at (708) 345-8600 or send us a message to start a conversation and let our PPS team show you why we are leaders in industrial manufacturing.

REQUEST A QUOTE

Power Plant Services is always ready to meet the need of our customers, 24 hours a day, 7 days a week, 365 days of the year.
